thread.section_title: Jennifer Garner News, Movie and Husband Ben Affleck Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Ben Affleck in Patriots cap at church with Garner
thread.title_full: Ben Affleck in Patriots cap at church with Jennifer Garner | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Jones For Dailymail.com
title: Ben Affleck in Patriots cap at church with Garner
text:
Jennifer Garner never misses church services.
And although estranged husband Ben Affleck attended mass with her and their three children - Violet, 11, Seraphina, eight, and Samuel, four - it appeared as though his mind was focused for the biggest sporting event later that afternoon.
The 44-year-old Oscar-winning actor showed support for the New England Patriots as they take on the Atlanta Falcons during the Super Bowl LI on Sunday.
Getting into the Spirit! Ben Affleck headed to church with Jennifer Garner and their kids - Violet, 11, Seraphina, eight, and Samuel, four - in Pacific Palidades on Sunday
The Batman star donned a Pats baseball cap as he showed loyalty for the football team from the region in which he was raised.
He bundled up on the chilly southern California day while attending the religious services in the Pacific Palisades.
Ben completed his look with a charcoal grey coat, matching knit sweater and dark trousers.
Showing support: The 44-year-old actor donned a Patriots baseball cap for the football team from the region in which he was raised
Cozy cutie: The Batman star bundled up on the chilly southern California day while attending the religious services in the Pacific Palisades
Family affair: The group was joined by Ben's mother, Christine Boldt, who layered a chic burgundy sweater over her all-black monochrome ensemble
Jennifer, 44, donned a cozy black wool coat with v-neck white top and appropriate knee-length skirt.
Her silky chestnut tresses were styled straight, parted down the center and tucked neatly behind her ears.
The Golden Globe winner opted for minimal cosmetics, featuring her natural beauty and flawless complexion.
Beauty in black: Jennifer, 44, donned a cozy wool coat with v-neck white top and appropriate knee-length skirt
Details: The Dallas Buyers Club star carried a large, black leather designer handbag which matched her pair of polished lace-up shoes
She carried a large, black leather designer handbag which matched her pair of polished lace-up shoes.
The Dallas Buyers Club's lookalike daughter, Violet, looked adorable in an olive green puffer coat, jean skirt and printed pink T-shirt.
Seraphina stood out in a colorful ensemble with teal shorts, a graphic blue sweatshirt and bright orange Velcro tennis shoes.
Little Samuel was dressed in army green pants, a grey shirt with matching sneakers and a black puffer coat.
Family affair: The group was joined by Ben's mother, Christine Boldt, who layered a chic burgundy sweater over her all-black monochrome ensemble
Darling daughter: Violet, looked adorable in an olive green puffer coat, jean skirt and printed pink T-shirt
The group was joined by Ben's mother, Christine Boldt, who layered a chic burgundy sweater over her all-black monochrome ensemble.
It has been over 18 months since Ben and Jen announced their separation after 10 years of marriage.
But the pair continue to live together at their Pacific Palisades property, and neither of the actors has made a move to officially file for divorce.
The former couple are rumored to have reconciled.
Their cordial relationship sparked the rumors, especially after Jennifer recently traveled to England at the same time as Ben.
Inked: As Ben loaded Samuel in the car after church, he revealed several tattoos on his back and hip
